name: WrappedWorkflowNodeEnt
description: A node wrapping (referencing) a workflow (also referred to it as wrapped metanode or subnode) that almost behaves as a ordinary node.

fields.name: WorkflowIncomingPorts
fields.description: List of all incoming workflow ports.

fields.name: WorkflowOutgoingPorts
fields.description: List of all outgoing workflow ports.

fields.name: IsEncrypted
fields.description: Whether the referenced workflow is encrypted is required to be unlocked before it can be accessed.

fields.name: VirtualInNodeID
fields.description: Node ID of the virtual in-node (i.e. source).

fields.name: VirtualOutNodeID
fields.description: Node ID of the virtual out-node (i.e. sink).
